author: Chris Love

episodes.title: Podcast 8: Linux
episodes.description: Linux, BSD, Solaris, Windows Server 2008, Server Operating Systems

episodes.description: SEO (search engine optimization), Internet Marketing, Monetization, Accessibility.

podcast.description: How To: Web Development, Web Design, Content Management Systems, and more.

episodes.description: CMS (content management systems), Web frameworks, Ruby on Rails, Drupal, etc.

podcast.description: How To: Web Development, Web Design, Content Management Systems, and more.

episodes.title: Podcast 5: Tools
episodes.description: Web design & development tools & IDE's, Eclipse, Firefox plugins, Firebug, etc.

podcast.title: OCDevel Web Development Podcast
podcast.description: How To: Web Development, Web Design, Content Management Systems, and more.

episodes.title: Podcast 4: Your First Site
episodes.description: Installing your first site on a WAMP server (windows, apache, mysql, php). Making your site publically accessible.

podcast.title: OCDevel Web Development Podcast
podcast.description: How To: Web Development, Web Design, Content Management Systems, and more.

episodes.title: Podcast 3: Client
episodes.description: Client Side Technology includes  - DHTML  - Flash, Silverlight, Applets  - RIA  Flash, Silverlight, AppletsDefine DHTMLCode execution: Browser vs. ServerDHTML  - css  - javascript and VBScript  - embedded vs external  - toolkits: Dojo, Moshikit, Scriptaculous, YUI, Prototype, JQuery, GWT...  client-side vs server-side  - speed: client way faster  - Security: can view source (vs server-side scripting), ctrl+u  - Compatibility: server-side produces same output no matter what, client-side has compatibility issues  RIA (Flex, OpenLaszlo)AJAX!!!

podcast.title: OCDevel Web Development Podcast
podcast.description: How To: Web Development, Web Design, Content Management Systems, and more.

episodes.title: Podcast 2: Server
episodes.description: Systems (sys admin)  - Linux, Windows Server 2003, BSD  Server Software (services)  - web servers  - database servers  - mail servers  - revision  - control servers  - *ports  Web Server Configuration  - apache, IIS  Database (dba)  - MySql, SQL Server, Oracle, Postgres  Server-side Scripting  - Script runs on web server, generates dynamic web page  - (vs client-side, which generates dynamic content in the browser)  - CGI  Web server extension modules  - CGI Languages: *Perl, Python, Ruby  - Web server extension modules: *PHP, ASP, ASP.NET  - Java servlets

podcast.title: OCDevel Web Development Podcast
podcast.description: How To: Web Development, Web Design, Content Management Systems, and more.

episodes.title: Podcast 1: Introduction
episodes.description: - Client: Web design ( HTML, CSS, Images ), Interactivity / Browser Objects ( Flash, Flex, Laszlo, Silverlight, Java Applets / Webstart), Client-side scripting ( JavaScript, AJAX)- Server: Server-side scripting( PHP, ASP, ASP.NET, J2EE, CGI, Python, Perl, Ruby), Database, Systems Administration- Internet marketing: SEO, Accessibility, Marketing, Monitization- Extras: WYSIWYG tools, Web Frameworks ( Django, Rails ), Blogging & CMS ( WordPress, Joomla!, Drupal)

podcast.title: OCDevel Web Development Podcast
podcast.description: How To: Web Development, Web Design, Content Management Systems, and more.
